Articles.Content:
Was wondering if the KSP VAB Stock was able to have it's Texture changed to look (outwardly) like our VAB back at the Cape. I've seen some KSP VAB make it taller mods, but was not sure if the default
texture files for the spaceport itself could be modified.
Thanks!
The texture files themselves are packaged into the game, but it could possibly be done with a modified version of Texture Replacer.
